38269.summary: Some customers in West St. Paul are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
38269.title: June 8 – West St. Paul | All Services - Outage (Fix in Progress)

live_updates: Our teams are looking into it. We estimate service will be restored by 1:00 PM. Please stay tuned for updates.
38275.summary: Some customers in the Renfrew area of Calgary are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
38275.title: June 8 – Calgary (Renfrew) | All Services - Outage (Fix in Progress)
